data.hero_headline: Revitalize Your Property with Tru-Blue Pressure Washing
data.hero_description: Expert pressure and soft washing services for your home and outdoor spaces.
data.about_text: At Tru-Blue Pressure Washing, we pride ourselves on delivering high-quality pressure washing services at competitive prices. Our team is dedicated to making your property shine, whether it's your home, driveway, or patio. Servicing Ipswich and surrounding suburbs, we are your local experts.
data.services_text: We offer a range of pressure washing services to meet your needs.

services.title: Exterior House & Hard Surface Cleaning
services.description: Comprehensive cleaning of your home’s exterior surfaces to instantly boost curb appeal. Includes house exteriors, driveways, pathways, patios, alfrescos and pool surrounds — removing built-up dirt, grime and mould for a fresh, like-new finish.

services.title: Driveway, Pathway & Access Cleaning
services.description: High-pressure cleaning for driveways, paths and walkways to remove dirt, stains and slippery buildup. Improves appearance while making access areas safer and easier to maintain.
services.icon_svg: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><svg width="48px" height="48px" stroke-width="1.4" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" color="#0a3f55"><path d="M8 10L16 10" stroke="#0a3f55" stroke-width="1.4" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M7 14L8 14" stroke="#0a3f55" stroke-width="1.4" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M16 14L17 14" stroke="#0a3f55" stroke-width="1.4" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M3 18V11.4105C3 11.1397 3.05502 10.8716 3.16171 10.6227L5.4805 5.21216C5.79566 4.47679 6.51874 4 7.31879 4H16.6812C17.4813 4 18.2043 4.47679 18.5195 5.21216L20.8383 10.6227C20.945 10.8716 21 11.1397 21 11.4105V18M3 18V20.4C3 20.7314 3.26863 21 3.6 21H6.4C6.73137 21 7 20.7314 7 20.4V18M3 18H7M21 18V20.4C21 20.7314 20.7314 21 20.4 21H17.6C17.2686 21 17 20.7314 17 20.4V18M21 18H17M7 18H17" stroke="#0a3f55" stroke-width="1.4"></path></svg>

services.title: Deck & Outdoor Living Area Cleaning
services.description: Specialised cleaning for timber decks, pool decks and outdoor entertaining areas. Uses gentle soft-washing techniques where required to protect surfaces while restoring their natural look and keeping spaces clean, safe and inviting.

data.experience_summary: Tru-Blue Pressure Washing is dedicated to providing exceptional service and results.
